definitions.title: n.pr.terr.
definitions.body: Philistia, poet. and late;—[[פְּלָָשֶׁת]] ([[ישְׁבֵי]]) Ex 15:14 (Fulistieim\ elsewh. (oi/) a)llo/fuloi), Joe 4:4, elsewhere [[פְּלֶשֶׁת]] Is 14:29, Is 14:31, Ps 60:10 = Ps 108:10, Ps 83:8, Ps 87:4; As. Palastu, Pilistu, COT:Ge 10:14 Dl:pa 288 f. Gk. Palaisti/nh Herod:ii. 104, 106, vii. 89 Jos:Ant. i. 6. 2 (also Fulisti/nou); v. Rel:Pal. 73 f.
